phrases.phrase: Renders a section displaying the latest resources in the activity summary email. Resources can be filtered on various criteria.
Renders a section displaying the latest reviews in the activity summary email.
Covers viewing resource categories or the list of categories.
Covers updating or creating a resource category.
Covers creating, updating and soft-deleting resource ratings/reviews.
Covers viewing resources and their content.
Covers creating, updating and soft-deleting resources and their content.
Resource review removed from public view
Resource update removed from public view (reason: {reason})
Resource version removed from public view (reason: {reason})
Limit viewing of fileless resources without download permissions
Require a review when rating resources
If enabled, users can choose to make their reviews anonymous. Staff will still be able to see who made the review, but end users will not.
If enabled, resource authors will have the option of specifying a small (96x96) icon. This icon will be displayed in resource lists and when viewing a resource.
The maximum number of other resources to display from a resource's author. Use 0 to disable this block.

If enabled, resource owners will be able to add up to 10 other users as team members for each resource. Team members will be able to take actions against a resource as if it were their own, with the exception of deletions which may only be performed by the owner.
If selected, users that cannot download resources will only see this number of characters from the descriptions of resources without a file.
When viewing the resource index or category overview pages, this will be the default order for resources.
If a review is entered, it will not be accepted unless it is at least this long. If a review is not required, this setting will be ignored if no review is entered.

Normally, when threads are automatically created for resources, the thread title is just the resource's name. This option lets you specify a format for paid Resources. Use {title} where the resource title should appear.
The maximum number of recent reviews to display on the main resource view page. Use 0 to disable this block.
The maximum number of recent updates to display on the main resource view page. Use 0 to disable this block.
If selected, users may only rate a resource once they have downloaded it.

Controls the currencies that users can select to apply to their resources. Add one currency per line. Each currency can only be 3 characters (USD, GBP, etc). A symbol will be used to display the currency if possible.
When a resource is deleted, take this action with any automatically created thread.
List the file extensions that are allowed to be uploaded. Use spaces or line break between extensions.
Provide the maximum resource file size in kilobytes (KB). Resources over this size will be rejected.
This is the maximum number of files that can be attached per resource version.
The number of resources that will be listed per page, including on the resource and category overview pages.
If enabled, users must submit a review when rating a resource.

This controls whether visitors can vote on whether a resource review is helpful. This can allow more helpful reviews to become more visible. If enabled, you may choose to limit voting to positive responses only (upvotes). Resource authors will not be able to vote on reviews for their own resources.

The maximum number of characters that can be in a resource update or description. This includes BB code. Setting this value too large or disabling it entirely may cause performance issues and is not recommended.
Options that control the resource manager add-on.
Manage tags by others in own resource
Can reply to reviews for own resources
Displays the most recently updated resources.
Displays above the resource list on the resource category pages. Widget templates rendered in this position can use the current category entity in the {$context.category} param.
Displays inside the side navigation on the resource category pages. Widget templates rendered in this position can use the current category entity in the {$context.category} param.
Displays above the resource list on the resource overview page.
Displays inside the side navigation on the resource overview page.

If no categories are explicitly selected, this widget will pull from all categories unless used within a resource category. In this case, the resources will be limited to that category and descendents.
All selected resources are already in the destination category. Please select another category.
Always moderate resource updates posted in this category
Always moderate resources posted in this category
The resources you have selected are located in more than one category. Each resource will only be updated if the chosen prefix is valid in its category.
Automatically post in the resource thread on resource deletion
You can not update your rating or review once the author has responded.
A carousel view, displaying the resources in a slider. This display is not designed for sidebar positions.
This category does not allow new resources.

This forum is assigned to a resource category and may contain resource threads. Changing the type to anything other than "General discussion" may cause the existing resource threads to lose their type association with resource items.
The description will contain the contents of this resource.
You do not have permission to view the full content of this resource.
This download is not available. Please try another.
Explain why you're giving this rating. Reviews which are not constructive may be removed without notice.
A full size view, displaying as a standard resource list.
If enabled, users will be given an option to enter a URL where their resource will be supported.
If enabled, users will be prompted to enter a version number and a history of previous versions will be displayed.
If you need to release a new version of this resource, you should post an update.
If no resource types are selected, this category will be used to maintain the category hierarchy only.
If selected, only staff will be able to see who wrote this review.
If selected, a post will be made automatically on the creator's behalf explaining that the resource is no longer available.
If selected, whenever a resource in this category is created, a thread will be posted in this forum. Only "general discussion" type forums may be selected.
If selected, users will be required to select a prefix when creating or editing a resource. This will not be enforced for moderators.
If you have a specific location where you will be providing support or answering questions, please enter the URL here.
The new icon could not be applied. Please try again later.
The new owner must be able to view this resource.
The new resource discussion thread must be a standard discussion thread.
Version {version} of {resourceTitle} posted in resource category {categoryTitle}
No prefixes are available for the specified categories.
No resources have been created yet.
No resources have been featured yet.
There are no resources to display.
No reviews have been left recently.
Non-purchasable resources may not define purchasable components.
Notify the current and new owners of this action.
Notify members watching the destination category
Please choose a valid type for this resource.
Please complete all commercial resource related fields.
Please enter a valid tag line.
Please provide a review with your rating.
Please select a valid resource type.
Provide a very brief, one-line description of your resource.
Any reason provided here will be included in the message that is automatically posted in the resource discussion thread explaining that the resource is no longer available.
The requested resource could not be found.
The requested review could not be found.
The requested update could not be found.
The requested version could not be found.

{username} submitted a new resource:
[url={resource_link}][plain]{title}[/plain][/url] - [plain]{tag_line}[/plain]
[quote]{snippet}[/quote]
[url={resource_link}]Read more about this resource...[/url]
This resource has been removed and is no longer available.
This resource has been removed and is no longer available. The following reason was provided: [quote][plain]{reason}[/plain][/quote]

{username} updated [url={resource_link}][plain]{resource_title}[/plain][/url] with a new update entry:
[url={update_link}][plain]{title}[/plain][/url]
[quote]{snippet}[/quote]
[url={update_link}]Read the rest of this update entry...[/url]
{resourceTitle} posted in resource category {categoryTitle}
The resource {title} was reassigned to you.
Stop notification emails from all resources
Team members are not displayed publicly, except to moderators and team members themselves.
There are no resources matching your filters.
There are no reviews matching your filters.
Update thread title on resource deletion
Update to {resourceTitle} in resource category {categoryTitle}
User has submitted at least X resources

Please do not reply to this message. You must visit the forum to reply.

This message was sent to you because you opted to watch the category "{category}" at {board} with email notification of new resources or updates.

If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you may disable emails from this category or disable all emails.
{author} created a resource within a category you are watching at {board}.
{author} updated a resource within a category you are watching at {board}.

Please do not reply to this message. You must visit the forum to reply.

This message was sent to you because you opted to watch the resource "{resource}" at {board} with email notification of updates.

If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you may disable emails from this resource or disable all emails.
{author} updated a resource you are watching at {board}.
This will require users to provide at least this many tags when creating a resource.
{name} added you as a team member for the resource {title}.
{name} has not posted any resources yet.
{name} left the resource team for the resource {title}.
{name} mentioned you in an update to the resource {title}.
{name} reacted to your update for resource {title} with {reaction}.
{name} reacted to {author}'s update for resource {title} with {reaction}.
{name} replied to your review of the resource {title}.
You have already rated this version. Re-rating it will remove your existing rating or review.
You have not posted any resources yet.
You may have up to {number} team member(s).
You may not add the following team members to this resource: {names}
You may not add resources to this category.
You may only add {count} team members to this resource.
You may only import from XenForo Resource Manager {version}.
You must upload a file or provide an external download URL.
You are not a member of any resource teams.
You are not watching any resources.
You can only rate a resource version that you have downloaded.
Are you sure you want to apply a prefix to {total} resource(s)?
Are you sure you want to delete this review response?
Are you sure you want to delete {total} resource(s)?
Are you sure you want to leave the resource team?
Are you sure you want to move {total} resource(s)?
Are you sure you want to reassign {total} resource(s)?
Are you sure you want to unwatch this resource?
Your reply will be attributed to {user} publicly.
Your resource {title} was moved to a different category.
Your review must be at least {min} characters.
Your review to the resource {title} was submitted.
Are you sure you want to stop watching all resources?
Are you sure you want to update your email notification settings for all resources?
